main event: A very bright, white object, size of a dime, was observed in Floral Park, Long Island, NY in November 1957.
interesting points: The object was described as being stationary and motionless, yet it was reported to be moving west at times., Observation lasted for 10 minutes., The object was seen by a 14-year-old student., The visibility conditions were thin scattered cirrus with hazy contrails., The conclusion reached was that the object was likely a balloon, possibly astronomical.
